value:
$bEvBg_Chapter3_BraveHellGate|$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Eir...$k$pLady...Eir...$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Wh-who are you?$k$p$EFace_Anger|This is... How have I arrived at the
Death Gate?!$k$p$WmMPID_ガングレト,ch00_45_Ganglot_F_Shadow,Face|It has been too long since our last
reunion, Lady Eir.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|You... I remember you. You were
Hel's handmaid. Ganglöt.$k$p$WmMPID_ガングレト,ch00_45_Ganglot_F_Shadow,Face|Ah, so you have not forgotten your
time with us. Yes, I served Lady Hel.
I did everything I could for her...$k$pBut then Askr's Order of Heroes
came and took Lady Hel from me,
and it was you who brought them.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ガングレト,ch00_45_Ganglot_F_Shadow,Face|The dead are restless, and they
wander with no one to follow.$k$pI grieve over an empty realm that
has lost its ruler.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Why are you telling me this?$k$pYou cannot be expecting me to
return here to take my mother's
place... I won't do it!$k$p$WmMPID_ガングレト,ch00_45_Ganglot_F_Shadow,Face|What makes you think I would
have you? You gave up your right
to succession.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Then what do you want with me?$k$p$WmMPID_ガングレト,ch00_45_Ganglot_F_Shadow,Face|This.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Anger|*gasp*$k$p$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$w0|$WmMPID_ガングレト,ch00_45_Ganglot_F_Shadow,Face|Hm. The Order of Heroes has
trained you well if you were able
to avoid that.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Wh-what do you want?!$k$p$WmMPID_ガングレト,ch00_45_Ganglot_F_Shadow,Face|You should know the answer to that
question by now. I have come to ruin
you, just like you ruined Hel.$k$p

$Fo500,255,0,0,150|$Fi500|$bEvBg_Chapter3_BraveHellGate|$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...Ngyah!$k$p$WmMPID_ガングレト,ch00_45_Ganglot_F_Shadow,Face|With your defeat, I will rise as ruler
of the realm of the dead!$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Pain|You want to rule yourself?!$k$p$WmMPID_ガングレト,ch00_45_Ganglot_F_Shadow,Face|Of course. The legions of dead
require an overseer.$k$pSo long as you remain, some may
object to my ascension.$k$pTherefore, as a practical matter,
you must be disposed of.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Pain|N-no... I refuse to believe this!$k$p$WmMPID_ガングレト,ch00_45_Ganglot_F_Shadow,Face|Well then, I should hurry back.
Have a good sleep, Lady Eir.
A sleep that you shall not wake from.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Help, $Nu...$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$bEvBg_Chapter3_BraveInside|$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|...Eir! Eir...$k$pIt's time to open your eyes, Eir.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Urgh...$k$p$EFace|I'm still alive? How? What happened?$k$p$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|Oh, good. It worked. I'm so glad!$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Who...are you?$k$p$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|Ah... Of course. You must
not remember. Well, then...$k$pI am Ymir.$k$pI am the dragon of life's realm—
the realm you come from.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Why...can't I remember?$k$p$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|Well, though you may not recall, we
were once very close, you and I.$k$pIn our realm, back then, you lived
with the king and queen, in the castle.$k$pYou were always smiling and being
cute as a young child.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Were the king and queen...
my real parents?$k$p$EFace_Pain|How could I have forgotten so much?$k$p$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|Though I knew this would eventually
come to pass, it still saddens me to
see you in such distress now...$k$pPlease know that I have always
kept you in my thoughts, Eir.$k$pAnd now, because you and your
comrades were able to defeat Hel,
I am able to appear to you like this.$k$pBut I was too late...$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Anger|That's right! Ganglöt... She tried
to kill me. How am I still alive?$k$p$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|I gave you my life. It was the option
that let me save you.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|What do you mean? You are standing
right in front of me, talking to me.$k$p$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|Hah... So I am. You, however, are
the only one who can see me.$k$pI exist only for you now, Eir.
Within you, I remain.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Pain|You gave up...your life for me?$k$p$WmMPID_ユーミル,ch00_44_Ymir_F_Normal,Face|Shed no tears for me, Eir. I made
this choice willingly, and would do
so again.$k$pIt is only right, since all the suffering
you were subjected to...was because
of me. That was all my fault.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|What? I...don't understand.$k$p

$WmMPID_水着ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Swim22,Face|This heat... The sun here borders
on brutal...$k$pWhy do mortals subject themselves
to such direct exposure? And so
happily, for that matter...$k$pDo they dream of living lives
entirely in weather like this?$k$p$WmMPID_水着スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_Swim19,Face|Oh! You wouldn't by chance be...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Swim19,Face|Lady Nifl? The god of ice herself?$k$p$WmMPID_水着ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Swim22,Face|You two... Both of you?$k$pYou both carry my blood in your
veins. Are you related to Fjorm?$k$p$WmMPID_水着スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_Swim19,Face|In fact we are!$k$pI'm Gunnthrá, Fjorm's elder sister.
And this is our younger sister, Ylgr.$k$pI apologize for appearing before
you dressed as we are now... We had
not expected to meet Lady Nifl!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Swim19,Face|Like Gunnthrá said, my name is Ylgr!
I'm so happy to meet you, Lady Nifl!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Swim22,Face|...$k$p

$WmMPID_水着スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_Swim19,Face|Would you care to go swimming
with us, Lady Nifl?$k$p$WmMPID_水着ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Swim22,Face|The sun is hateful against my skin.
I would rather not.$k$pSeeing that crowd there, however,
I do understand this place offers
desirable experiences for some.$k$pIt must be difficult to live in Nifl,
a land of constant snow and ice.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Swim19,Face|Not at all! The beach is fun,
but Nifl is good too!$k$p$WmMPID_水着スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_Swim19,Face|Living in the snow is not the easiest
life, I will admit.$k$pBut our culture and traditions in Nifl
have been shaped to warm us when
our bodies grow cold...$k$pThat sense of togetherness is
something we cherish.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Swim22,Face|But had I not granted Hvergel
the power of my blood...$k$pthe claim could be made that your
people could have lived together
in a land free of snow and ice...$k$p$WmMPID_水着スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_Swim19,Face|Fjorm told us you were thoughtful
and kind, Lady Nifl. You certainly
live up to her praise.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Swim22,Face|Silence.$k$pAny more such talk and I will be
forced to dunk the three of you
in ice.$k$p$WmMPID_水着スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_Swim19,Face|Lady Nifl, I know you have a reason
for pushing people away, but...$k$pI will not make you revisit your pain.
I just want you to know that we are
truly happy to have been born in Nifl.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Swim22,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Swim19,Face|Hey! Do you want to play with us,
Lady Nifl?$k$p$WmMPID_水着スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_Swim19,Face|Now, Ylgr, we have interrupted
her solitude enough. We should
be going.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Swim19,Face|Oh... All right...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Swim22,Face|Wait. Take this.$k$p$WmMPID_水着スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_Swim19,Face|A...frozen treat? Where did this—$k$p$WmMPID_水着ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Swim22,Face|I acquired it not long ago. I was
told it was an extra. You need it
more than I do.$k$pI won't be swimming, and you two
must also suffer in the sunlight, so
it will do you good.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Swim19,Face|Yay! Thank you, Lady Nifl.$k$p$WmMPID_水着スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_Swim19,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_水着ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Swim22,Face|Now, please leave.$k$p$WmMPID_水着スリーズ,ch00_10_Cerise_F_Swim19,Face|Yes! Of course. Excuse us, Lady Nifl.$k$pHee hee... She is just as kindhearted
as I had expected her to be...$k$pOne day Lady Nifl's heart will thaw,
and then we'll all be able to laugh
and have fun together. I know it!$k$p
